hint.en: When enabled, the values will be reset to 0 when the device is started. This will allow you to see bars in the insights.
When enabled, the values will be updated in the device when the price changes. You can use these values in flows.
Choose if you want to display duration seconds, when days/hours/minutes are applicable. If duration is les then 1 min it will always show seconds.
Choose the maximum number of decimals you want to see in the usage values. This will not show 0 at the end, f.e. 16.7798 = 16.78
Choose the maximum number of decimals you want to see in the cost values. This will not show 0 at the end, f.e. 16.7798 = 16.78
